security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill with no executable code. It contains only markdown files describing weather functionality and API integration guidance. No security risks detected.

content.user_title: Get Weather Updates for Any City
content.value_statement: Stop switching between apps to check weather conditions. This skill provides instant weather information for cities worldwide directly in your AI assistant.
actual_capabilities: Query current weather for major Chinese cities
Provide temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Return weather data in Chinese language
Simulate weather data for unsupported cities
limitations: Currently uses simulated data, not real-time weather
Limited to 5 major Chinese cities for accurate data
No weather alerts or severe weather warnings

use_cases.title: Check Destination Weather
use_cases.description: Plan your trip by checking weather conditions before traveling to Chinese cities like Beijing, Shanghai, or Guangzhou.

use_cases.title: Daily Weather Briefing
use_cases.description: Start your day with a quick weather update to plan your outfit and activities without opening weather apps.

use_cases.title: Practice Chinese Weather Terms
use_cases.description: Learn weather-related Chinese vocabulary while getting practical weather information in Chinese.

best_practices: Use city names in Chinese for better accuracy with supported cities
Specify dates when checking weather for specific days
Combine with other skills for travel planning
anti_patterns: Don't rely on this for critical weather decisions - data is simulated
Avoid requesting weather for unsupported cities if you need accurate data
Don't use for severe weather warnings or emergency situations

faq.question: Is the weather data real-time?
faq.answer: No, this skill currently uses simulated data. Real API integration is documented but not implemented.

faq.question: Which cities are supported?
faq.answer: Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, and Hangzhou. Other cities return simulated data.

faq.question: Can I get weather forecasts for future dates?
faq.answer: Yes, you can query weather for specific dates using YYYY-MM-DD format.

faq.question: Is this skill available in English?
faq.answer: The skill interface is in Chinese, but you can request weather for any city worldwide.

faq.question: How do I integrate real weather API?
faq.answer: See weather_api.md for integration guides with OpenWeatherMap or WeatherAPI.

faq.question: Can I get severe weather alerts?
faq.answer: No, this skill only provides basic weather information without alerts or warnings.
